name: EverQuest II
content:
files:
- setup: https://launch.daybreakgames.com/installer/EQ2_setup.exe
game:
  exe: /drive_c/users/Public/Daybreak Game Company/Installed Games/EverQuest II/LaunchPad.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    description: Simulating Windows reboot.
    executable: wineboot
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing EverQuest 2
    executable: setup
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
